attributes.action: Prevent Russsia from hosting the world cup
attributes.background:
Football should be enjoyable for all, there are a few radical unfortunate individuals who insist in using violence for football hooliganism. 
Russian football fans unfortunately take this to extreme, they are extremely dangerous individuals and hosting a world cup in their country could be wrong

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government or Parliament is not responsible for decisions about the hosting of the World Cup. That is the responsibility of FIFA.
